goflow.workflow.applications – key application function for workflow mgmt¶

goflow.workflow.applications.format_exception(etype, value, tb[, limit=None])¶

Format the exception with a traceback.

Parameters:

  • object – exception type

  • value – exception value

  • tb – traceback object

  • limit (integer or None) – maximum number of stack frames to show

Return type:

list of strings
